article_title: Resolution: Stem the abuse of opioids
article_text: ‘Enforcing the law is no less important than alleviating pain or reducing addiction.’

article_metadata.title: Resolution: Stem the abuse of opioids | Miami Herald

og.description: There is a grim connection between two worsening addictions — to prescription opioid painkillers and to heroin — in the United States and Florida.
